definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch_simple"><field name="tries">1</field><field name="xzSpread">7</field><field name="ySpread">0</field><field name="schedule_tick">FALSE</field><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:PalmTree</field></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="84" w="215">If the lake does generate, we move it horizontally, so that it doesn't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We place the lake at the top non-air block, which will be the surface during world generation</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, to make sure that the lake only generates in the selected "Restriction biomes"</comment><next><block type="placement_noise_based_count"><field name="ratio">1</field><field name="factor">200</field><field name="offset">0</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_replace_sphere" x="661" y="56"><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">5</field><field name="max">12</field></block></value></block><block type="blockstate_selector" x="661" y="166"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block"></field></block><block type="blockstate_selector" x="851" y="167"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block"></field></block><block type="blockstate_selector" x="1017" y="289"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block"></field></block><block type="int_provider_constant" x="1217" y="313"><field name="value">5</field></block><block type="placement_count" x="40" y="638"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Each chunk will try to generate 3 disks of sand</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">3</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This moves the feature so that it doesn't generate in the corner only</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate the feature on the ocean floor</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate the feature only in water</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_fluids"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="fluid">WATER</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Prevents the feature from generating in other biomes</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
